original_title: Survival Guide for a Post-Apocalyptic Child (X)
overview: X is wondering when a thing becomes a thing, and when some other thing becomes too much. X is to wonder how do you know if not by intuition, when peculiarity becomes overpowering or when danger becomes arousing or when violence escapes its sexy boundaries? The short film is part of Nastja Säde Rönkkö’s 26-part Survival Guide for the Post-Apocalyptic Child.
title: Survival Guide for a Post-Apocalyptic Child (X)
